T02D1494:208a-1: badzra a'a sa na badzra g'i ti /
T02D1494:208a-3: rdo rje gdan gyi rdo rje'i glu /
T02D1494:208a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1494:208a-5: dpal ldan rdo rje gdan spor sangs rgyas dang //
T02D1494:208a-6: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin dngos bdag nyid can //
T02D1494:208a-7: zab pa'i don ldan glu 'di ston gyur pa ;
T02D1494:208a-8: / yon tan kun rdzogs de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1494:208a-9: lus 'di rnams skams sems ni nyon mongs pa'i //
T02D1494:208a-10: de 'dra'i byed pa ma lus yongs spangs nas //
T02D1494:208a-11: des ni 'gro kun rang bzhin rnam dag par //
T02D1494:208a-12: dpal ldan rdo rje'i gdan la sangs rgyas gyur //
T02D1494:208a-13: mdzes ma mchog ldan khyer nas rab tu myur bsgrubs pas //
T02D1494:208a-14: nee ranydza na'i 'gram du bde bar 'jug pas 'dus //
T02D1494:208a-15: byang chub shing rtsar rdo rje gdan bzhugs nas //
T02D1494:208a-16: rdo rje dper byas ting nge 'dzin la gnas //
T02D1494:208a-17: ting 'dzin bla na med pa'i lam 'dis kye //
T02D1494:208a-18: bdud bzhi'i 'jigs ba chen po gang de bcom //
T02D1494:208a-19: gzugs ni ma spangs lhan cig rnam rol pas //
T02D1494:208a-20: rang bzhin bdag med ma dang 'dus gyur nas //
T02D1494:208a-21: dngos med yid 'ong bdag gi btsun mo de //
T02D1494:208a-22: chags med zhi bas nyon mongs med gang gis //
T02D1494:208a-23: skye dang 'chi ba srid pa'i 'khrul pa spong //
T02D1494:208a-24: 'khrul med bde ba chen por len cing ster //
T02D1494:208a-25: de la kha dog dbyibs dang tshad kyang med //
T02D1494:208a-26: byed med 'dod med skye med nga rgyal med //
T02D1494:208a-27: bdag med gang la sems ni zhugs gyur na //
T02D1494:208a-28: bdag gzhan dbye ba ma lus mi mthong ngo //
T02D1494:208a-29: 'gro dang 'od dang gar yang gnas pa med //
T02D1494:208a-30: nam mkha'i ngo bo yang dag ji lta bar //
T02D1494:208b-0: rnal 'byor thub mchog ma @208b lus rnam par rol //
T02D1494:208b-1: de ni bdag med btsun mo zhes nga smra //
T02D1494:208b-2: chags med byams dang snying rje las byung ba'i //
T02D1494:208b-3: byang chub smon pa'i sems ni legs brtan byed //
T02D1494:208b-4: rang bzhin goms pa'i yid ni gar mi gnas //
T02D1494:208b-5: 'di de nyid ni bla med byang chub lam //
T02D1494:208b-6: rab rib can ni mkha' la skra mthong smra //
T02D1494:208b-7: rab rib can dang 'gro kun khyad med kyi //
T02D1494:208b-8: skye med gnas med 'gro kun yang dag par //
T02D1494:208b-9: mig 'phrul ji bzhin nges par yongs su snang //
T02D1494:208b-10: brtag pa'i spros pas bskyed la ma chags shig / byang chub bla med lam du de mi 'gyur //
T02D1494:208b-11: sna tshogs rnam rtog las gzhan 'ching ba med ;
T02D1494:208b-12: / de las skye 'chi 'khor ba gzhan ma yin //
T02D1494:208b-13: rnal 'byor 'gro la bdag gis snying po smras //
T02D1494:208b-14: rnam rtog rgyu bas gar yang ma blta zhig / rnam rtog gzhan min gti mug gzhan ma yin //
T02D1494:208b-15: chags dang 'jigs dang khro las de gzhan min //
T02D1494:208b-16: gang gang rnam brtags de brdzun phyin ci log /
T02D1494:208b-17: nges par rnam brtags bde ba chen por 'dod //
T02D1494:208b-18: 'di lta'i ting nge 'dzin bde ba chen por smra //
T02D1494:208b-19: skye dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas gar yang gnod pa med //
T02D1494:208b-20: ri dags smig rgyu chur mthong yongs rgyug kyang //
T02D1494:208b-21: dub pas 'chi 'gyur gang yang bde rnyed med //
T02D1494:208b-22: kye lags yid kyi ri dags bde ba'i chu 'dod ba ;
T02D1494:208b-23: / yul gyi smig rgyu la ni ma rgyug dang //
T02D1494:208b-24: yul gyi smig rgyu gang la'ang bde chu med //
T02D1494:208b-25: bden dngos mi shes ci zhig 'dod pas rgyug /
T02D1494:208b-26: grong du longs spyod bde ba tshol ba'i byol song
T02D1494:208b-27: gang // byol song de ni skra yi zhags pa dam pos bcings //
T02D1494:208b-28: gang gi ngo bo shes pas gar yang 'gro med pa'i //
T02D1494:208b-29: ting 'dzin rol pas bsam mi khyab par spro //
T02D1494:208b-30: gang la yid kyi bya rgod rten pa'i shing //
T02D1494:208b-31: de la bde ba'i me tog lo ma skye ba med //
T02D1494:208b-32: nges par yid kyi bya rgod bcings bsad na //
T02D1494:208b-33: g-yo zhing 'gyur bas ma legs byed par gang zhig 'gyur //
T02D1494:208b-34: gang tshe yid kyi bya rgod bcings las grol bas na //
T02D1494:208b-35: sha thag mang po 'thung zhing za bas bkres pa med //
T02D1494:208b-36: gnyis su mthong ba'i phyogs ni bcom pas khyod //
T02D1494:208b-37: gang gis gar yang 'bad pa byed pa med //
T02D1494:208b-38: stong nyid brtan gyis 'khrul pa spang du med //
T02D1494:209a-0: 'khrul pas 'ching spang sems par ma byed cig / gang gang las byung de ni nges @209a * //
T02D1494:209a-2: / mi rtog ting nge 'dzin gyis de bsal gyis //
T02D1494:209a-3: rnam rtog dri ma chen po ma lus khrus //
T02D1494:209a-4: nam mkha'i me tog dang 'dra dngos po mnyam par
T02D1494:209a-5: rtog / des sbyangs bag chags bral bas rnal 'byor
T02D1494:209a-6: ma mthong ba // nam mkha'i me tog bung bas 'jib pa mthong ba 'dra //
T02D1494:209a-7: nges sbyangs dam tshig spyod pa rnam dag pa //
T02D1494:209a-8: 'jig rten spros pa gnas pa dang ni 'gal ba yin //
T02D1494:209a-9: nam mkha'i me tog bung pas 'jib pa 'dra ba yi //
T02D1494:209a-10: bdag dang gzhan du lta ba'i 'khrul pa chom //
T02D1494:209a-11: 'jig rten spros pa rdo rje phab nas ni //
T02D1494:209a-12: 'jig 'dzin ngo tsha aa wa dh'u t'is spongs //
T02D1494:209a-13: byang chub smon pa snying rjer bcas gnyis kyis //
T02D1494:209a-14: nges par sbyangs 'dir thams cad 'dus par 'gyur //
T02D1494:209a-15: bla ma'i bka' lung gang yin rin po cher snang
T02D1494:209a-16: gi / gzhan pa'i rin chen de las bde ba
T02D1494:209a-17: ci zhig 'byung // bla ma'i man ngag med pa de las 'bras mi 'byung //
T02D1494:209a-18: dri ma can gyi ras la gur gum tshon bzhin no //
T02D1494:209a-19: rnal 'byor ma nyams myong na rnal 'byor par 'gyur bas //
T02D1494:209a-20: gzhon nu ma gzhan 'dus pas bde bskyed pa //
T02D1494:209a-21: gang gis srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol 'gyur ba'i //
T02D1494:209a-22: bla ma'i lung las gces pa gzhan ci yod //
T02D1494:209a-23: snying rjes gzhan phan slob mas 'jug pa yi //
T02D1494:209a-24: dur smig 'dzin pa'i slongs mos rnyed dka' min //
T02D1494:209a-25: yi ge shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1494:209a-26: 'gro ba dbyer med rnam par ston pa yin //
T02D1494:209a-27: sems rmongs byed pa'i bstan bcos yongs spongs dang //
T02D1494:209a-28: don dam shr'i he ru kar 'gyur pa yin //
T02D1494:209a-29: rgyu med sogs las skye ba rmongs ba ni //
T02D1494:209a-30: 'gog cing stong par yi ge he 'dis bstan //
T02D1494:209a-31: rtog dpyod bral ba'i don dam gang yin pas //
T02D1494:209a-32: 'chi ba spong bar yi ge ru 'dis bstan //
T02D1494:209a-33: dngos dang dngos med gang la'ang mi gnas pa //
T02D1494:209a-34: srid dang mya ngan 'das med yi ge ka 'dis bstan//
T02D1494:209a-35: 'di ltar bzhi yis bstan pa'i don gang yin //
T02D1494:209a-36: de ni don dam shr'i he ru ka / mkhas
T02D1494:209a-37: pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi
T02D1494:209a-38: dngos po'i don nyid kyis ji ltar gzigs pa de
T02D1494:209a-39: ltar gzhan la bstan pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang gi
T02D1494:209a-40: gnas su gshags pa'i tshe skyi shod snye thang bkra
